sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { assets } from '../../assets/assets' import './FoodItem.css' const FoodItem = ({id, name, price, description, image}) => { const[itemCount, setItemcount] = useState(0) return (
{!itemCount ? setItemcount(prev=>prev+1)} src={assets.add_icon_white} /> :
setItemcount(prev => prev-1)} src={assets.remove_icon_red}/>

{itemCount}

setItemcount(prev => prev+1)} src={assets.add_icon_green}/>
}

{name}

{description}

${price}

) } export default FoodItem
